item.description:
Back by popular demand, I will be hosting another evening of games at Panera Bread. Even though they close at 9:00 p.m., we may be able to gather at the outside tables for one last game if the weather and bugs aren't too bad.  Sorry for the last minute notification.  If you didn't get your fill of game playing on Sunday, come on out for another night of fun and socializing with us.

I do request that when we hold Meetups in food or drink establishments that everyone in attendance order at least one item or beverage. 

I will bring my usual assortment of games which now includes my new purchase - Ticket to Ride: The Card Game.  I would also be interested in playing another game of Dominion if anyone who owns the game was willing to bring it to the event.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be the group of cool people with all the games. I will try to get the same tables in the center of the restaurant.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: "Across the Bridge" Game Night
